languages.text: {n}Морщинистое лицо становится еще серьезнее.{/n} "Правильнее сказать: "Когда что-то случится". Благословение Императора оберегает нас от воздействий варпа. Но в пустоте водятся ужасы, для которых даже такая защита не станет преградой. Особенно, если проводить в их компании столько времени, сколько это делаем мы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Морщинистое лицо становится еще серьезнее.{/n} "Правильный вопрос — "когда". Благословение Императора оберегает нас от воздействий варпа. Но в пустоте водятся ужасы, для которых даже такая защита не станет преградой. Особенно, если проводить в их компании столько времени, сколько это делаем мы".

languages.text: {n}The expression on his wrinkled face grows even more serious.{/n} "It would be more on point to say 'when' something happens. The Emperor's blessing protects us from the warp's various influences. However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."
languages.original_text: {n}Морщинистое лицо становится еще серьезнее.{/n} "Правильнее сказать: "Когда что-то случится". Благословение Императора оберегает нас от воздействий варпа. Но в пустоте водятся ужасы, для которых даже такая защита не станет преградой. Особенно, если проводить в их компании столько времени, сколько это делаем мы".

Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."

However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."

languages.text: {n}La expresión de su rostro arrugado se vuelve aún más severa.{/n} «Lo más acertado sería decir "cuando le ocurra algo". La bendición del Emperador nos protege de las diversas influencias de la disformidad, pero en el vacío acechan horrores para los que incluso esta defensa no supone un obstáculo. Especialmente dado el tiempo que pasamos en sus dominios».
languages.original_text: {n}The expression on his wrinkled face grows even more serious.{/n} "It would be more on point to say 'when' something happens. The Emperor's blessing protects us from the warp's various influences. However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de su rostro arrugado se vuelve aún más severa.{/n} «Lo más acertado sería decir "cuando le ocurra algo". La bendición del Emperador nos protege de las diversas influencias de la disformidad, pero en el vacío acechan horrores para los que incluso esta defensa no supone un obstáculo. Especialmente dado el tiempo que pasamos en sus dominios».

languages.text: {n}しわの刻まれたその顔は、さらに険しくなる。{/n}「何かが「起きたとき」と言ったほうが的確だろう。皇帝のご加護により、私たちは<歪み>のあらゆる影響から守られている。しかし、この守りさえものともしない恐怖が、ヴォイドには蔓延っていることもあるのだ。私たちのように、その恐怖と共に過ごす時間が長ければなおさらだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The expression on his wrinkled face grows even more serious.{/n} "It would be more on point to say 'when' something happens. The Emperor's blessing protects us from the warp's various influences. However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}しわの刻まれたその顔は、さらに険しくなる。{/n}「何かが「起きたとき」と言ったほうが的確だろう。皇帝のご加護により、私たちは<歪み>のあらゆる影響から守られている。しかし、この守りさえものともしない恐怖が、ヴォイドには蔓延っていることもあるのだ。私たちのように、その恐怖と共に過ごす時間が長ければなおさらだ」

languages.text: {n}他满是皱纹的脸变得更加严肃。{/n}“‘如果’这个词不太准确，因为唱诗班是一定会发生事故的。尽管帝皇的祝福可以保护我们免受亚空间的各种影响，但亚空间的虚无之中存在着无数恐怖之物，哪怕是帝皇的祝福也无法彻底将其隔绝。像我们这种服役多年的星语者，对这一点更是心知肚明。”
languages.original_text: {n}The expression on his wrinkled face grows even more serious.{/n} "It would be more on point to say 'when' something happens. The Emperor's blessing protects us from the warp's various influences. However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}他满是皱纹的脸变得更加严肃。{/n}“‘如果’这个词不太准确，因为唱诗班是一定会发生事故的。尽管帝皇的祝福可以保护我们免受亚空间的各种影响，但亚空间的虚无之中存在着无数恐怖之物，哪怕是帝皇的祝福也无法彻底将其隔绝。像我们这种服役多年的星语者，对这一点更是心知肚明。”

languages.text: {n}Der Ausdruck auf seinem runzligen Gesicht wird noch ernster.{/n} "'Wenn' etwas geschieht wäre treffender Der Segen des Imperators schützt uns vor den verschiedenen Einflüssen des Warps. Doch in der Leere hausen Abscheulichkeiten, für die selbst dieser Schutz kein Hindernis wäre. Insbesondere, wenn man so viel Zeit in ihrer Gesellschaft verbringt wie wir."
languages.original_text: {n}The expression on his wrinkled face grows even more serious.{/n} "It would be more on point to say 'when' something happens. The Emperor's blessing protects us from the warp's various influences. However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ausdruck auf seinem runzligen Gesicht wird noch ernster.{/n} "'Wenn' etwas geschieht wäre treffender Der Segen des Imperators schützt uns vor den verschiedenen Einflüssen des Warps. Doch in der Leere hausen Abscheulichkeiten, für die selbst dieser Schutz kein Hindernis wäre. Insbesondere, wenn man so viel Zeit in ihrer Gesellschaft verbringt wie wir."

languages.text: {n}L'expression de son visage ridé devient encore plus grave.{/n} « Il serait plus juste de dire "quand" il arrivera malheur à notre chœur. Voyez-vous, si la bénédiction de l'Empereur nous préserve des diverses influences du Warp, il y a dans le vide intersidéral des horreurs contre lesquelles Son saint pouvoir lui-même ne saurait lutter. En particulier pour ceux qui comme nous passent autant de temps en leur compagnie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The expression on his wrinkled face grows even more serious.{/n} "It would be more on point to say 'when' something happens. The Emperor's blessing protects us from the warp's various influences. However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de son visage ridé devient encore plus grave.{/n} « Il serait plus juste de dire "quand" il arrivera malheur à notre chœur. Voyez-vous, si la bénédiction de l'Empereur nous préserve des diverses influences du Warp, il y a dans le vide intersidéral des horreurs contre lesquelles Son saint pouvoir lui-même ne saurait lutter. En particulier pour ceux qui comme nous passent autant de temps en leur compagnie. »

languages.text: {n}Buruşuk yüzündeki ifade, daha da ciddi bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Buna 'başına bir şey geldiğinde' demek daha yerinde olur. İmparator'un lütfu, bizi öteboyutun envaiçeşit nüfuzundan korur. Ancak uçsuzda nice dehşet mevcuttur. Onlar karşısında böylesi bir savunma bile engel teşkil etmeyebilir. Bilhassa bizim gibi bu dehşetlerin etrafında çok zaman harcayanlar için..."
languages.original_text: {n}The expression on his wrinkled face grows even more serious.{/n} "It would be more on point to say 'when' something happens. The Emperor's blessing protects us from the warp's various influences. However, there are horrors dwelling in the void for which even this defence would be no obstacle. Especially if one spends as much time in their company as we do."
